text:
@Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Please, please, please!  We need a field hospital in El Centro, CA.
Newsom has moved 500 Covid-19 hospital patients to other counties...only 1 hospital there. Newsom spreading Covid to other counties.  Please look into this!  Imperial County can’t handle with 1 hospital!
